answers.answer: How long did it take for u to get your results back ?

I took the one hour test yesterday and got them right away... I know i am in normal range.  Only becauae I have an aunt and uncle that have diabetes my midwife suggests I take 3 hour test..... I just don't feel like I should have to!
Uh Yeah I would tell her no since your in the normal range. The 3 hour is no fun at all. I'd be irritated too
Oh I was just wondering cause I took mine last Wednesday on the 4th Nd they haven't called me or anything. So I'm guessing they came out alright ?
If your parents or grandparents don't have it, they shouldn't be worried especially since you passed.
The 3 hour can be miserable so yeah I'd be so annoyed. If you passed that should be it.

question: So anything below 140 is passing the one hour glucola test and my midwife wants me to do the 3 hour because diabetes runs in my family..... I am so annnnoyed.
title: 134 on one hour glucose test
